ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do you find anyone to teach you Dragon?  I imagine Dragons aren t too friendly?  Or can you train in this from a guildmaster? ... From: Ken Morris To: EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Where do you find anyone to teach you Dragon? I imagine Dragons aren't too friendly? Or can you train in this from a guildmaster?
----- Original Message -----
From: Ken Morris
To: EQ Wizards
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 12:29 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Languages


I am excellent in Dragon, Combine, Old Eurdian, Elder Elvish, and am working on Elder Tier'Dal today. I will be happy to teach Dragon and Combine for 6 runes each. The rest, I will teach for 3 runes or 5 plat each. I am located on the Tarew Marr server. I am firm on the Dragon and Combine btw. I won't accept money but only runes for those languages.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
